basics.label: Senior Frontend Developer
basics.summary: A passionate and pragmatic software engineer with over 7 years' experience building enterprise-level, high traffic web applications. I specialise in developing React with TypeScript applications and have a heavy focus on maintainability while building at scale through robust unit and integration testing. Drawing from my background in project management, I naturally gravitate towards facilitating technical coordination by providing support to junior engineers and advocating for industry standard practices within Agile delivery teams.
